item.description: Hey Urists, It's Alexandra here with patch 52.04 to fix issues with armies/squads travelling. We're sorry this was such a pain to deal with in-game, it was a nasty bug. There's also some other fixes in there. The team's focus for September is continuing with the siege update. We will have more news and details to share soon. New Single Release Dabu and Simon Swerwer just released the new single, a remastered and reimagined rendition of "Danger Room" using the original recordings. The cover art is also by Dwarf Fortress pixel artist Carolyn. This track will also be making its way into the game soon. Give it a listen: Release notes for 52.04: General updates Fixed issue with squads/armies breaking into groups and not rejoining. Mod upload doesn't clobber info.txt. Fixes a crash when choosing clothing sizes in workshop. Fixed out-of-bounds error in army processing. Fixed out-of-bounds error in transformed units. Fixed armies deleting items improperly. Fixes a potential crash in wrestling....
